description: This file defines the OrdersProvider class, a ChangeNotifier that manages an in-memory list of Order objects for a Flutter frontend application. It provides methods to list, add, and update orders, acting as a mock repository for managing order data.

classes.name: OrdersProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages a list of Order objects in-memory, allowing addition and updating of orders, and providing a read-only snapshot of current orders.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list snapshot of current orders.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Inserts a new order at the beginning of the list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status of an existing order identified by id; no operation if order not found.

methods.name: createMockOrder
methods.description: Generates a mock Order object with random id, code, customer name, total amount, and a default 'Pending' status.
